short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the background photo and display the email address dynamically in Superhuman.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows you to customize your Superhuman experience by removing the default background and dynamically displaying the email address currently in use. The email address will automatically disappear after 5 seconds. The extension also includes an easy-to-use popup to enable or disable the “No Background” option.
